Question: The book recounts this person's life with her husband, Paul ****, in post-World War II France.
Hints: This person's use of ingredients like butter and cream has been questioned by food critics and modern-day nutritionists.
Julia Carolyn **** (née McWilliams; August 15, 1912 – August 13, 2004) was an American chef, author, and television personality.
Though she was not the first television cook, this person was the most widely seen.
